title: Number of operable nuclear reactor plants by country 2019
summary: This bar chart has 30 columns on the x axis representing Country, and Number of reactors in each Country on the y axis.
The Number of reactors is highest at Country United States and lowest at Country Iran.
Country United States has 97.0 times more Number of reactors than Country Iran which is has the lowest.
min_summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Number of reactors for 30 number of Countrys.
The Number of reactors is appeared to be the highest at Country United States and lowest at Country Iran.
mid_summary: This bar chart has 30 columns on the x axis representing Country, and Number of reactors in each Country on the y axis.
The Number of reactors is highest at Country United States and lowest at Country Iran.
Country United States has 97.0 times more Number of reactors than Country Iran which is has the lowest.
max_summary: This is a bar chart representing Country in the x axis and Number of reactors in the y axis.
The maximum Number of reactors 97.0 is found at Country United States and the minimum is found at Iran where Country is 1.0.
The second highest Number of reactors is appeared to be the Country France.
The difference of Number of reactors between the highest and lowest Country is 96.0.
The Country United States has the highest Number of reactors, followed by France, and China. Down to the Country Iran which is the lowest.
Country Mexico, Romania, South Africa, Brazil, and Bulgaria have a similar Number of reactors that is 2.0.
The Country Iran has 6.58 times less Number of reactors than average.
